chardham-helicopter-tour.title: Chardham Helicopter Tour
chardham-helicopter-tour.description: Experience the divine Chardham Yatra (Yamunotri, Gangotri, Kedarnath & Badrinath) in comfort with our premium helicopter service.
highlights: Visit all four sacred Dhams in a single journey

itinerary.title: Arrival in Dehradun & Yamunotri
itinerary.description: Arrive at Dehradun airport, transfer to helipad, fly to Yamunotri, visit temple, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Yamunotri to Gangotri
itinerary.description: Morning prayers, helicopter transfer to Gangotri, temple visit, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Gangotri to Kedarnath
itinerary.description: Morning prayers, helicopter transfer to Kedarnath, temple visit, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath to Badrinath
itinerary.description: Morning prayers, helicopter transfer to Badrinath, temple visit, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Badrinath Exploration
itinerary.description: Full day at Badrinath, visit Mana village, evening aarti, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Return to Dehradun
itinerary.description: Morning prayers, helicopter transfer to Dehradun, departure.

do-dham-helicopter-tour.title: Do Dham Helicopter Tour
do-dham-helicopter-tour.description: Visit the sacred shrines of Kedarnath and Badrinath with our exclusive helicopter service for a spiritually enriching experience.
highlights: Visit two major Dhams in a single journey

itinerary.title: Arrival in Dehradun & Transfer to Kedarnath
itinerary.description: Arrive at Dehradun airport, transfer to helipad, fly to Kedarnath, visit temple, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath Exploration
itinerary.description: Morning prayers, explore surrounding areas, evening aarti, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath to Badrinath
itinerary.description: Morning prayers, helicopter transfer to Badrinath, temple visit, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Return to Dehradun
itinerary.description: Morning prayers, helicopter transfer to Dehradun, departure.

kedarnath-helicopter-tour.title: Kedarnath Helicopter Tour
kedarnath-helicopter-tour.description: Reach the holy shrine of Kedarnath quickly and comfortably with our dedicated helicopter service.
highlights: Quick and comfortable access to Kedarnath

itinerary.title: Arrival in Dehradun & Transfer to Kedarnath
itinerary.description: Arrive at Dehradun airport, transfer to helipad, fly to Kedarnath, visit temple, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath Exploration
itinerary.description: Morning prayers, explore surrounding areas, evening aarti, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Return to Dehradun
itinerary.description: Morning prayers, helicopter transfer to Dehradun, departure.

road-chardham-yatra.title: Road-based Chardham Yatra
road-chardham-yatra.description: Experience the traditional Chardham Yatra by road, taking in the scenic beauty of the Himalayas.
highlights: Visit all four sacred Dhams in a single journey
Assistance for darshan at all temples
Comfortable road transfers in AC vehicles

itinerary.title: Arrival in Haridwar
itinerary.description: Arrive at Haridwar, check-in to hotel, evening Ganga Aarti, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Haridwar to Yamunotri
itinerary.description: Drive to Janki Chatti, trek to Yamunotri, temple visit, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Yamunotri to Gangotri
itinerary.description: Drive to Gangotri, temple visit, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Gangotri to Kedarnath
itinerary.description: Drive to Sonprayag, trek to Kedarnath, temple visit, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath to Badrinath
itinerary.description: Trek down from Kedarnath, drive to Badrinath, temple visit, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Badrinath Exploration
itinerary.description: Full day at Badrinath, visit Mana village, evening aarti, overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Return to Haridwar
itinerary.description: Drive back to Haridwar, departure.

leh-ladakh-tour.title: Leh Ladakh Tour
leh-ladakh-tour.description: Explore the breathtaking landscapes of Leh Ladakh with our exclusive tour package, offering adventure and serenity.
highlights: Drive through Khardung La Pass, one of the highest motorable roads
Experience the unique culture of Leh

itinerary.title: Arrival in Leh
itinerary.description: Arrive at Leh airport, acclimatize to the altitude, and explore the local market.

itinerary.title: Leh Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Shanti Stupa, Leh Palace, and the Hall of Fame Museum.

itinerary.title: Leh to Nubra Valley
itinerary.description: Drive to Nubra Valley via Khardung La Pass, visit Diskit Monastery, and enjoy a camel ride.

itinerary.title: Nubra Valley to Pangong Lake
itinerary.description: Drive to Pangong Lake, enjoy the stunning views, and overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Pangong Lake to Leh
itinerary.description: Drive back to Leh, visit Hemis and Thiksey Monasteries en route.

itinerary.title: Leh Exploration
itinerary.description: Explore local attractions and shop for souvenirs.

itinerary.title: Departure from Leh
itinerary.description: Transfer to Leh airport for departure.
